welcome.title: Welcome to Kids guard
welcome.subtitle: A tool to help parents manage device settings
welcome.question: Are you a parent?
welcome.footer: Parents will need to verify their identity to continue
welcome.childAlert: This app requires parent setup. Please ask a parent to set up the app.

parentVerification.title: Parent Verification
parentVerification.instruction: To verify you're a parent, please solve this simple math problem:
parentVerification.note: Note: This verification ensures only adults can set up parental controls.

setupPIN.instructionCreate: Create a 4-digit PIN to protect parent settings
setupPIN.errorMismatch: PINs do not match. Please try again.
setupPIN.errorSave: Failed to save PIN. Please try again.
setupPIN.tip1: Choose a PIN that's easy for you to remember
setupPIN.tip2: Don't use obvious combinations like 1234 or 0000
setupPIN.tip3: Keep your PIN secure and don't share it

pinEntry.title: Enter PIN
pinEntry.instruction: Enter your 4-digit PIN to access parent settings
pinEntry.errorGeneric: An error occurred. Please try again.
pinEntry.helpText: Forgot your PIN? You'll need to reinstall the app and set it up again.

home.lockedMessage: This setting is controlled by a parent
home.infoText: This app helps parents manage device settings. When a setting is locked, only a parent with the PIN can change it.

parentSettings.headerSubtitle: Manage device settings for your child
parentSettings.lockedNotice: This setting is locked. Children cannot change it.
parentSettings.placeholderNotice: No saved value yet. Adjust the control and apply or lock to store it.
parentSettings.warning1: Locked settings will be enforced while the app runs
parentSettings.warning2: Children may still change settings through device controls
parentSettings.warning3: The app will attempt to restore your settings when changes are detected
parentSettings.warning4: For best results, keep the app running in the background
parentSettings.successVolumeUnlocked: Volume unlocked - child can adjust freely
parentSettings.successBrightnessUnlocked: Brightness unlocked - child can adjust freely
parentSettings.permissionMessage: To control system brightness, this app needs permission to modify system settings. Please grant this permission in the next screen.
parentSettings.permissionSuccess: Brightness permission granted. Settings have been applied.

pinChange.instructionCurrent: Enter your current PIN to continue
pinChange.instructionConfirm: Re-enter your new PIN to confirm
pinChange.errorSame: New PIN must be different from current PIN
